document.full_text: as foreign rescue workers combed debris to locate victims of japan's quake and tsunami, countries offered further aid from field hospitals to atomic physicists to address an unfolding nuclear crisis.
document.title: aid offers to japan pour in as nuclear concerns mount
lines_and_colors: as foreign rescue workers combed debris to locate victims of japan's quake and tsunami, countries offered further aid from field hospitals to atomic physicists to address an unfolding nuclear crisis.
